title: Didn't get icon/border
body: Got silver 4 didn't get icon or border. Lol must be a mistake tho (riot pls hurry up i know ur really bad at maintaining a game and/or balancing it but srly just give it to me before this goes on redit :D)

replies.body: Unfortunately, it doesn't look like this was a mistake.  Feel free to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'd be happy correspond privately to offer more context.  We'll reply to your ticket as soon as we can!
